TEXT.TITLE: BRENDA MINES SELLING KERR ADDISON SHARES
TEXT.BODY: <Brenda Mines Ltd> said it sold 2,830,390 <Kerr Addison Mines Ltd> shares to a group of underwriters led by Wood Gundy Inc and Brown, Baldwin Nisker Ltd for redistribution. Financial terms were undisclosed. Reuter
